title: Computer damage in the third degree
context: [ยง708-892.6] Computer damage in the third degree. (1) A person commits the offense of computer damage in the third degree if the person knowingly accesses a computer, computer system, or computer network without authorization and thereby recklessly causes damage. (2) Computer damage in the third degree is a class C felony. [L 2014, c 213, ยง1]
